ai_analysis.narrative: Your assessment reveals a strong alignment with AI Research within Artificial Intelligence & Data (Technology). Your investigative drive, combined with your aptitude scores, suggests you are well-suited for analytical and problem-solving work in this domain. Your personality profile shows a balance of curiosity and conscientiousness that are key differentiators in this specialization.
ai_analysis.why_this_path: The convergence of your RIASEC profile, Big Five personality dimensions, and aptitude scores consistently points toward AI Research. Your strongest trait signals create a profile that fits the demands and culture of this career path exceptionally well.
strengths: Ability to sustain focus on complex problems
Structured approach to tasks and deliverables
growth_areas: Broaden exposure to adjacent disciplines for cross-functional thinking
Invest in communication skills to articulate technical ideas clearly

ai_analysis.key_insight: You are built for AI Research — trust the data and your instincts equally.
